scripts.deploy:heroku: git checkout master && git merge --no-ff develop -m 'Merged into develop' && git push origin master && git push heroku master && git checkout develop
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: git checkout -b gh-pages develop && git merge --no-ff develop -m 'Merged develop into gh-pages' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout develop
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.serve: npm run watch & http-server ./ & livereload src
